text: The Algerian Football Federation (, ; AFF) is the governing body of football in Algeria. It is in charge of the men's and the women's national teams. The association was founded in 1962. It became a member of FIFA in 1963 and CAF in 1964. It is based in Algiers, the nation's capital. title: Algerian Football Federation
